about.title: About Us
about.description: Grampanchayat Palaskhed Nago/Naik, located in Paithan Taluka of Aurangabad District, is a progressive village under the Zilla Parishad. With a population of approximately 1500 and 200 households, our village represents a thriving democratic community.

project1.title: Tanda Clean Village Scheme
project1.description: Various cleanliness programs and development initiatives for village sanitation.

project2.title: Complete Water Pipeline Project
project2.description: Joint initiative by Zilla Parishad, community, and Gram Panchayat.

project3.title: School and Anganwadi Development
project3.description: Collaborative effort for educational infrastructure improvement.

about.note: Grampanchayat Palaskhed Nago/Naik is recognized as a clean and beautiful village. Our primary responsibilities include citizen welfare, community development, and transparent administration.

note.title: Note from Administration
note.content: We are committed to the development and welfare of our village. Through various initiatives and projects, we aim to improve the quality of life for all residents while preserving our cultural heritage.
